title: Font evaluation criterion for web sites
content:
I am doing a survey on web fonts for Urdu. I am looking for font evaluation criterion. I have to suggest web fonts for Urdu (from existing fonts) and guide lines for future web fonts. Would you please discuss on that. I will also appreciate references to some books and articles.

Thanks  
Atif
author: Atif

comments.content: Legibility is the criterion. Stay away from color over color.
